subject: Speedskating
Olympic Games (2010)
lead_paragraph: Ireen Wust used a blazing final lap to win the gold in the women’s 1,500 meters. Kristina Groves of Canada took the silver but her countrywoman, the favorite Christine Nesbitt, faded to sixth.
snippet: Ireen Wust used a blazing final lap to win the gold in the women’s 1,500 meters. Kristina Groves of Canada took the silver but her countrywoman, the favorite Christine Nesbitt, faded to sixth.
